DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate immunogenicity safety GlaxoSmithKline Biologicals ' human papillomavirus ( HPV ) vaccine pre-teen adolescent female subject age 9 - 17 year . One group subject receive HPV vaccine group receive control .
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity Safety Study GSK Biologicals ' Human Papillomavirus 580299 Vaccine Healthy Female Subjects
